A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie gives me some surprises\, like snoke (apparently) dead so easily\, the attempt to destroy the tracking device turning out to be a failure\,  the appearance of Yoda\, no actually laser saber duel in the end\, etc. The movie brings new elements to Star wars and meanwhile  destory some old as well.\n\nBTW\, I don't think Snoke was really dead. There were 2 to 5 seconds' time in the movie giving to the half body of Snoke after he was killed. I think this implied something.
